programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat analysoivat uusia todisteita Chupacabra -nimisen legendaarisen verta imevan pedon olemassaolosta, ja olennosta saattaa olla olemassa jopa kaksi versiota!

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The Barn Sanctuaryn porsaat ovat valmiita muuttamaan uuteen tilavaan palatsiinsa. Henkilokunta jarjestaa Andy-lehman kuoleman jalkeen muistotilaisuuden.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2018),

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Irtokoiranpentujen ensimmaiset elinviikot Thaimaassa ovat vaaroja taynna. Kathmandussa koiria palvotaan ja ne puetaan kukkaseppeleisiin Tihar-festivaalin kunniaksi.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe asuu Alaskan villissa luonnossa sivilisaation ulkopuolella, missa koko elama riippuu perheen yhteistyon sujumisesta. Brownin perhe kasvaa yhdella jasenella, kun Noah menee naimisiin Rhainin kanssa. Tilalla on myos kaynnissa iso rakennusprojekti.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet pystyvat mita ihmeellisimpiin tekoihin, mutta miten? Asiantuntijat kertovat yllattavia tosiasioita elainten valtakunnan salaisuuksista ja nayttavat kuvamateriaalilla.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet pystyvat mita ihmeellisimpiin tekoihin, mutta miten? Asiantuntijat kertovat yllattavia tosiasioita elainten valtakunnan salaisuuksista ja nayttavat kuvamateriaalilla.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Miamin hylatyt. Miamin elainpoliisit kokevat tehtavan itselleen erityisen laheiseksi, kun he loytavat kaksi jo adoptoitua koiraa kadulta avun tarpeessa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Surua riittaa tutkija Labradan yrittaessa pelastaa omistajiensa hylkaaman sairaan koiran. Nuori tytto pelastaa hevosen, joka on jatetty ilman ruokaa ja vetta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Uuden-Meksikon kuivalla Tinajan aavikolla Bradley ja Billy jahtaavat jattimaista scolopendra-tuhatjalkaista. Myrkkykynsilla varustettu otus on vasymaton tappaja.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 4 osa 1/10. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, Iso-Britannia, 2017)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff ja tiimi tarjoavat ilmaista apua Meksikon koyhille perheille. Yhdessa tyontayteisessa viikossa he ehtivat hoitaa satoja avun tarpeessa olevia elaimia.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri tarkastaa pahoin loukkaantuneen Daniel-vallabin, joka ei pysty kavelemaan. Robert ja Chandler hyppaavat hetkeksi aalloille ennen uuden komodonvaraanin noutamista.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: UUSI SARJA! Kausi 1, osa 1. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Lizzy ja Elise yrittavat pelastaa pahasta nestehukasta karsivan koiran. Hylatty, pelokas koira muutetaan uuteen varastorakennukseen, joka on suunniteltu eritystarpeisille koirille.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Pariskunta ei uskalla hankkia lasta vihaisen Martini-kissansa takia. Hiekkalaatikosta taisteleville Tana - ja Buddha -kissoille taytyy opettaa sopuisaa kaytosta.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perheen kaksi nigerialaista kaapiovuohta aiheuttaa sekasortoa takapihalla! Antonio tekee pihasta hauskan vuohien leikkikentan, johon kuuluu mm. kiipeilytorni.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Palomies Ricky on pelastanut palavasta rakennuksesta burmanpythonin. Kellarin muokkaaminen valtaisaksi kaarmemaailmaksi on yksi Antonion kaikkien aikojen suurimmista hankkeista.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: RAndB-laulaja Keyshia Cole unelmoi kauniista suolavetisesta akvaariosta kotiinsa. Sosiaalisessa mediassa ihailijat johtavat hanet suoraan ATM:n pakeille!

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Maailmanmestarinyrkkeilija Fernando Vargas tilaa nyrkkeilyhanskan muotoisen akvaarion harjoitussalilleen Las Vegasiin. Tuleeko siita taystyrmays?

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Howie Mandel tilaa uuden akvaarion, talla kertaa yllatykseksi agenttinsa yritykselle. Jo olemassa oleva akvaario tarvitsee paivitysta.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Nelivuotias maltanterrieri Therodore saapuu sairaalaan mystisten oireiden takia. Koiran tilan heiketessa laakarit tuskailevat diagnoosin kanssa.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan.

programme.title: Shark After Dark
programme.desc: Hait ovat tunnetusti aktiivisia ja aggressiivisia paivisin, mutta niiden oisesta kayttaytymisesta tiedetaan hyvin vahan. Sukeltajat laskeutuvat pimeyteen saamaan lisatietoa.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Haikalojen erikoistuntijat Brandon McMillan ja Jimi Partington palaavat Guadalupen saarelle etsimaan maailman suurinta isoa valkohaita, joka tunnetaan nimella Deep Blue.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan ruokaa varasteleva ja taloa tuhoava kissa, jaakaapissa tuhoa aiheuttava kani ja koira, joka jahtaa jaateloautoa niin kauan, etta se saa mehujaatelon.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: The Browns begin an ambitious barn build, the key to Billys grand vision. Plus, Noah returns, reuniting the entire wolfpack for the first time since Alaska.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa parjaaminen riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii joella.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Grace-vauva tutkii maailmaa, samalla kun Robert ja tiimi yrittavat tehda Australian elaintarhan suurimman alligaattorin siirron. Terri avustaa sumatrannorsuja.

programme.title: Project Grizzly
programme.desc: Karhunkouluttaja Jeff Watson palauttaa kaksi suojattiaan, Bobin ja Screetchin takaisin luontoon. Onko karhuilla selviamiseen tarvittavat taidot hallussa?

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The Barn Sanctuaryn porsaat ovat valmiita muuttamaan uuteen tilavaan palatsiinsa. Henkilokunta jarjestaa Andy-lehman kuoleman jalkeen muistotilaisuuden.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff loytaa koiralta ison kasvaimen. Elainlaakariteknikko Kelly hoitaa oman koiransa auringonpolttamaa kirsua. Elainlaakarit Baier ja Hector hoitavat yhdessa biisonia.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikemies Brad Jennings tilaa uuden toimistonsa loppusilaukseksi kolme akvaariota. Niissa nakyy lisahuoneita, joista yhdessa on jopa toimiva takka!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat taistelevat rikoksia vastaan ja suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja. Valvojat loytavat rajajoelta laittomia verkkoja huumekuriireja etsiessaan.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii yksinaisella joella.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Kaksi elakelaista Wisconsinista rakennuttaa maatilalleen aittamaisen puumajan. Pete suunnittelee kolme luksusosastoa ja terassin, josta on nakyma alpakoiden tallille.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 10 osa 12/21. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. (Pit Bulls And Parolees, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 8, osa 11. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Grace-vauva tutkii maailmaa, samalla kun Robert ja tiimi yrittavat tehda Australian elaintarhan suurimman alligaattorin siirron. Terri avustaa sumatrannorsuja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff loytaa koiralta ison kasvaimen. Elainlaakariteknikko Kelly hoitaa oman koiransa auringonpolttamaa kirsua. Elainlaakarit Baier ja Hector hoitavat yhdessa biisonia.

programme.title: Luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit
programme.desc: Kuinka erikoinen luonto voikaan parhaimmillaan olla! Elaimet kayttaytyvat meidan silmiille kovin oudosti ja erilaisissa tapahtumaketjuissa ei tunnu olevan mitaan jarkea. Niinpa asiantuntijoista koostuva ryhma on valmiina ratkaisemaan luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit.

programme.title: Luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit
programme.desc: Kuinka erikoinen luonto voikaan parhaimmillaan olla! Elaimet kayttaytyvat meidan silmiille kovin oudosti ja erilaisissa tapahtumaketjuissa ei tunnu olevan mitaan jarkea. Niinpa asiantuntijoista koostuva ryhma on valmiina ratkaisemaan luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Alaskan kolmiona tunnetulta alueelta etsitaan siella huhujen mukaan piileskelevia mystisia luontokappaleita.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat taistelevat rikoksia vastaan ja suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja. Valvojat loytavat rajajoelta laittomia verkkoja huumekuriireja etsiessaan.

programme.title: Weird, True And Freaky: Real Monsters
programme.desc: Ohjelma listaa kymmenen verisinta hyokkaysta, joiden tekijoina on mm. massiivisia hirvioita, kiemurtelevia kaarmeita, veitsihampaisia kissoja ja merien salakavalia tappajia.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa kaksi puumajaa 13-vuotiaalle esiintyja Grace VanderWaalille. Tiimi rakentaa boheemin klubitalon ja ikkunaseinaisen taideateljeen.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mosambikista hengenvaarallista paholaisenkukan rukoilijasirkkaa. Terien ja koukkujen peittama hyonteinen on lahes huomaamaton, silla se nayttaa trooppiselta kukalta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: We reveal the new science shedding light on the secrets of Tutankhamuns burial, use the latest technology to investigate what could have killed him and get a taste of the Pharaohs life of pampered luxury.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: See the long, dark, frozen winters to sweltering, bug-infested summers in remote Canada.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Starting from one of the worlds most remote cities, Walvis Bay, in Namibia, we roll 1,500 miles through the Kalahari desert to Pretoria, South Africas Executive Capital.

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Around 12,000 years ago, as the Ice Age finally thawed, humanity made a dramatic shift - abandoning nomadic life for permanent settlements. 5/5

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: This episode reveals how a planets size can mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong heads to the north of Iceland to experience at first hand possibly the worlds most disgusting dish before meeting one of Icelands finest jumper knitters.

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: We reveal the new science shedding light on the secrets of Tutankhamuns burial, use the latest technology to investigate what could have killed him and get a taste of the Pharaohs life of pampered luxury.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: Steve Backshall and his team of young shark saviours are coming to the end of their time in the shark sanctuary around the island of Bimini. They have completed four separate open water dives, passing forty different skills.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman investigate the origins and production of more household staples, beginning with tea. Gregg looks at the factory that produces one quarter of all the tea drunk in Britain. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey examines an African tea processing plant, and Ruth Goodman sheds light on how Second World War troops risked their lives to brew up

programme.title: Serengeti
programme.desc: Mafuta, the baby hippo, is in crisis. His pod has been taken over by a marauding male, and his mother must take him far from the river. Kali, the lioness, tries to dig the warthogs out of the den, but the situation turns comical when the rest of the pride gets involved. Lions and warthogs run amok across the plains in a hunt with a surprising outcome. Will the warthogs come out on top, or is this a family Kali can finally be proud of? For everyone, the good times will soon be over as the dry season starts to take hold. The lake becomes a place of refuge not just for the thirsty herds but also for Mafuta and his mother. Duma, the cheetah, takes the coalition to the lake to hunt. By finally working together, they manage to catch a wildebeest, but their efforts capture the attention of Zalika and the thieving hyenas. Things go from bad to worse when the coalition discovers a female cheetah, and arguments break out as to what they should do. They end up fighting among themselves as the female escapes. Duma decides hes better off alone, but is it the right decision? As the herds move on and dust clouds fill the plains, Bakari leads his troop in search of better foraging. To reach it, they must cross the shrinking river and risk a run-in with Magamba. But the far side is no safe haven: Bakari has taken them into the territory of another baboon troop, one the size of a small army. When all-out war threatens the survival of his troop, Bakari realises his last hope may lie with the elephants. On the plains, Utani and his pup are foraging for delicacies when a hungry serval strikes. Could he have taken Utanis pup? Nalla is leading Kadogo and the herd on a life-saving mission to find water. She takes them to the lake, but when they arrive, she finds it is fast disappearing and the water unfit to drink. Nalla must call on all her wisdom to find a solution before its too late.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Andy Bassich and Denise Becker attempt a harvest that isnt usually available this time of year. Iriqtaiq Hailstone sets out to help her sisters and to teach her son a native skill.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys into Zambia to live with a British family who have built a safari lodge on the edge of a national park. In the process, Ben uncovers what motivates them to keep going in the face of challenges including fire and flooding.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Starting from one of the worlds most remote cities, Walvis Bay, in Namibia, we roll 1,500 miles through the Kalahari desert to Pretoria, South Africas Executive Capital.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is at the worlds largest dried pasta factory in Italy where they produce 150,000 kilometres of spaghetti each day. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey is discovering why the best pasta is made with durum wheat, and Ruth Goodman discovers that the product arrived in Britain much earlier than many would imagine

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMFriday 5 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Linz to BratislavaSeason 7 Episode 5 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo travels by train through Austria and the Czech Republic, beginning in the northern Austrian city of Linz, where Adolf Hitler lived as a young boy. From here, Michael travels onto Prague Central Station, where he meets 87-year-old Zuzana Maresova, who, as a seven-year-old girl climbed aboard a train to travel to safety in London with hundreds of other Jewish children. Eventually crossing the Czech border into Slovakia, Michael reaches his final destination, one of Europes youngest capital cities, BratislavaGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Friday 5 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerCassie FarrellDirector

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees
programme.desc: Whilst humans are prone to fighting the inevitability of ageing, trees have perfected the art of aging gracefully. In this episode, we will discover how mature trees do incredible things to thrive in an often turbulent world, and may even work together to do so. 2/3

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Ricko DeWilde travels to cursed lands to finally lay his brothers spirit to rest. Sue Aikens ventures into the tundra to map the shifting landscape. 4/16

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: The presenter travels to the Azores islands, a remote archipelago in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean, to meet Magnus, Lucy and one-year-old Frey. The family live in an off-grid cottage on a steep sloped mountain which Magnuss nomadic father bought in the 1980s, and they have spent the past 15 years taking on the gargantuan task of restoring the property and land.

programme.title: Asia: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at this dazzling exploration of Earths biggest and most varied continent, Asia.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: In Alaska, Ben Fogle meets Mike and Fran, who live in a self-built log cabin in a remote spot ten days walk from civilisation. The family have created a completely self-sufficient lifestyle, working the land and trapping animals.

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: All life on Earth needs water so the search for aliens in the solar system has followed the search for water. Professor Brian Cox examines the patterns in the ice on Jupiters moon Europa, which reveal an ocean far below with more potentially life-giving water than all the oceans on Earth. But of all the wonders of the solar system forged by the laws of nature, there is one that stands out as Brian reveals the greatest wonder of them all.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Viimeisella huviretkellaan Travel Manina Richard Ayoade rientaa Dubrovnikiin komedian kolossin Stephen Merchantin kanssa. Kaksikko laskeutuu maailman parhaiten museoituun keskiajan kaupunkiin syoksyakseen fantasian kimppuun. Parivaljakko lahtee paljolti Dubrovikissa kuvatun Game of Thronesin kierrokselle, jossa tarkastelevat joitain sarjan ikonisimpia tapahtumapaikkoja ennen jatkamistaan kokeilemaan paikallisesti tuotettuja Ston-ostereita. Simpukat hoideltuaan he suuntaavat kukkuloille, ja kahden ja puolen tunnin ajan he saavat kuraa paalleen kuullessaan alueen modernista historiasta monkijan kyydissa. Heidan minilomansa kulminoituu hetkeen, joka ei ole kummankaan toivelistalla, kun he istuvat Game of Thronesin valtaistuimen muovisella kopiolla.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Koomikko Lou Sanders lahtee Richard Ayoaden mukaan kahden paivan pikakaynnille Bergeniin. He tutustuvat sita ymparoiviin vuoriin ja vuonoihin seka kokevat parasta, mita talla norjalaiskaupungilla on tarjota. Parivaljakko tutustuu Bryggenin lahioon ennen lahtoa koysiradalle Ulriken-vuoren huipulle, jossa he testaavat Norjan nopeinta vaijeriliukua. Sen jalkeen Richard ja Lou nousevat veneeseen gastronomista seikkailua varten, kun heidan oppaansa Marrian luotsaa heidat pikkusaarelle osittain itse keratylle aterialle, joka valmistetaan avotulella. Richardin ja Loun loma jatkuu nousulla toiselle vuorelle, kun he astuvat Flibanenin funikulaariin, joka nousee Flyen-vuoren laelle. Sielta he menevat puunistutuskierrokselle, tsekkaavat Tubakuban, ja vuohi kohtelee Louta kylmasti.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Lamminhenkinen kisareality. Hyvantuulisessa ompelukisassa 10-12 harrastajaa ottaa haasteen vastaan ja neulan kateensa kilpaillakseen paremmuudesta. Kipailijoita testataan kaikessa ompeluun liittyvassa, materiaalien hallinnassa, ompelutekniikassa ja suunnittelussa. Jokaisessa jaksossa on kolme erilaista tehtavaa ja juontajana toimii koomikko Joe Lycett. Sarja on ollut suosittu Britanniassa ja se on koonnut television eteen seka innostuneet harrastajat etta asiaan perehtymattomat. (The Great British Sewing Bee, S5-7. Britannia, 2019-2021.)

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwals precious plant once a day while hes on holiday. Its all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbours gadgets while hes away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night but Mr Beans other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwals got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - dont worry, well have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irmas brochure a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But hes so engrossed he doesnt notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Bolly can take a break and head off to have fun, our Mushlers insist that they will do all the repairs around Mushton for him. Now Bolly needs to fix all their repairs!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone realizes that they dont actually know what Fung and Miffs special gifts are! So Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out without Fung and Miff knowing.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has created a cloak out of a leaf, and Chanterelle thinks its super fashionable. But when she makes a similar cloak to Cheps, a fashion rivalry is born!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To finally bring life-long friends Mushpot and Starmush back together, Truff goes to help Starmush succeed at an impossible challenge set by Musho

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie gets sick, our Mushlers find it impossible to believe that she turns into the most demanding Mushable ever. Well, theyre about to find out that its all true!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung finds out that to earn a delicious treat from Sushi-Mushi you just need to look after the Food Snail for him. No problem! Actually, it becomes a huge problem for Fung!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. Grizzy realizes that if he wants to take a nap, he must first get rid of the magic beans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guys making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day! But when the Food Snail falls for, and takes off after, the Travel Snail, Pancake Day has to be cancelled. Chep sees an opportunity to save the day for his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: MMs favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere - nature must run its course. But Lilit feels so sorry for the frog she takes it back to Mushton where it causes havoc. Now our friends must lure the frog back to its home where it deals with the lizard itself.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Its Fool the Forest Day! Mushables pull pranks all over Mushton, and Mush-Mush has an epic one planned. But our Mushlers spill Chanterelles paint by accident, and now they must replace it by finding a rare Sloof beetle they have never heard of.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When ants invade Fung and Miffs tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in... but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. So when Fung and Miff break their trampoline, our friends decide its time for them to go back to their homes. But first they need to get rid of the ants...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his friends are determined to win the bark sledge race, but their essential fourth team member drops out. Our friends ask Mushpot to step up from being their coach to racing with them. The Mushelder is reluctant at first but soon reveals the tough competitor he is!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs prove their inventing skills by coming up with an age-altering time-ray. This breakthrough could change the world. If they used it for something other than chasing Lamput. Obsessed much, fellas? Wildly shooting their time-ray off in public causes a not-unsurprising amount of chaos, until the local law enforcement gets caught in the cross-fire. Looks like the Specs and Skinny are gonna be in jail till they get old the normal way.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang enters the heart of the American Gothic South in order to help an attractive farmer who Fred wants to impress with his mystery-solving prowess. A horrifying Scarecrow has come to life and attempts to drive everyone off his farm.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.desc: Mr. Bean discovers he has a doppelganger: Mr. Pod. They wear the same clothes and look exactly alike. Unfortunately, it all goes wrong when his girlfriend, Irma, thinks that Mr. Pod is much more handsome than Bean.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs And Skinny are late to work and Boss is mighty angry! The Docs cook up a quick, fake story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robots artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoos refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedias instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.desc: When all of the Batwheels (except for Bam) mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M, the original Batmobile, to help save his friends. Along the way, Bam comes to appreciate the old-school mobiles different crimefighting style as they team up to take on the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyones surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as V-8, the Super-Spy, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A music video introducing all of Batmans heroic vehicle squad -- the Batwheels -- and showcasing their incredible gadgets, stunning talents and unique personalities.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price- tag to match.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot is too tired to give anyone advice, he asks Mush-Mush to answer the Mushables requests on his behalf. But now Mush-Mush thinks he is the leader of Mushton!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep thinks he has remembered that he is younger than his two best friends, Mush-Mush and Lilit, it affects his whole confidence.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are ecstatic: Muddlers fear of spiders rid the forest of him! But they soon learn that even Muddler is essential to the health of the forest.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit looks up to Chanterelle as an awesome role model. She would so love to be like her one day. But when she starts imitating Chanterelle it doesnt go to plan.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has a bad feeling. There is something he knows he should remember but cant. When he finally pieces his memories together, he gets what his bad feeling was about Mushton is about to be attacked by a plague of hungry woodworms! Prepare the defences!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon... which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment. Starving, Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. Only the Lemmings are already using it for their latest rocket game in the piping system.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff doesnt like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. Mush-Mush and friends need to get Puff to relax and celebrate spring together with all the other Mushables!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. When Grizzy accidentally jumps in, he quickly gets caught up in the game and the clapometer goes wild! Intoxicated by his victory, the bear is by no means a modest winner! But the Lemmings want their moment of glory in the limelight as well!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone
