programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De gang gaat naar een festival voor de Dag van de Doden. Daar komen ze erachter dat de geest van een oude legendarische crimineel, El Bandito, is teruggekeerd om de bevolking angst aan te jagen. Fred raakt geobsedeerd met het mysterie en wil onderdeel van de legende worden.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur. / When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a festive course for the Fall foot race. Wile E. Coyote is determined to beat the Road Runner with his Robo-Runner despite its malfunctions.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike orders Tom and Jerry to watch Tyke while hes away, but instead Tom takes the opportunity to chase Jerry in the backyard. Suddenly, Tyke is nowhere to be seen and the front gate is wide open! Tom and Jerry must find the pup in time or face Spikes beating.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, Tom is carried off to Dr. Frankensteins castle lab. Several lightning bolts later, a monster comes to life: a nine-foot-tall hulk with Toms relatively tiny head sewn on. Frankenstein orders the monster to go terrorize the village, but it has problems focusing after Toms head sees Jerry in the lab.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry go to a pool party at Toodless place, Tom shows off in the pool with ridiculous stunts. Butch and Meathead arrive, adding more rivalry to the party. Soon, Toodles suggests they play a game of water polo, which reaches a fever pitch before long.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike the bulldog comes to Tom and Jerry, complaining he is being harassed by unknown creditors, ex-girlfriends, and other problems due to identity theft. They take the case on and go in search of who could be using Spikes name. It quickly becomes equally confusing for them to sort out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A fast-talking sales cat named Dr. Jake L. appears to Tom from a trap door in the floor, selling Ache-Eee Bones tonic. However, when the doctor sees Jerry and Tuffy, he instantly turns into the slobbering Mr. Hyde-Cat and chases them, but then changes back to the doctor. Tom wants to buy the tonic but soon finds out whats happening with the visiting cat and tries to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger argue on their anniversary, Cupid decides to get involved. However, he gets a head injury in a chase between Tom and Jerry and forgets who he is. Now its on Tom and Jerry to remind Cupid of his identity and help Ginger and Rick stop fighting.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly. / When Harley Quinns Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinns Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Velmas got an interview at the prestigious Kingston University the most selective school in the country. The only catch? The dean wants her and the rest of the Scooby gang to figure out why the ghost of Elias Kingston the schools founder is haunting Kingstons book-filled halls!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar een Victoriaans moordmysteriefeest, zodat ze zich mooi kunnen aankleden en een nepmysterie kunnen oplossen voor de verandering. Maar wanneer een onthoofde graaf (DAVID KAYE) daadwerkelijk mensen begint te ontvoeren, moet de gang boef pakken!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the infiltrating Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick accidentally locks Tom and Jerry in the garage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The butler asks Tom to rid the upstairs of a mouse before the owners return. If Tom succeeds, hell live and work the rest of his life upstairs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry find themselves in a garden growing contest that turns out badly for Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overly ambitious young house sitter ruins Toms plans to rule the roost while Rick and Ginger are away. Jerry relishes in Toms predicament, that is until the house sitter spots the mouse and he becomes enemy number one!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few dead ends.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A sales representative offers Tom all sorts of materials to finally catch Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks taken up painting to help him relax. Although hes warned them to stay out of his studio, Tom and Jerry inadvertently destroy his first painting. In an effort to reproduce it before he returns home, Tom and Jerry end up in a competition to prove whos the better artist. May the best Renoir win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry try to locate a dog somewhere in the city, whose barking is keeping them awake.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Beans bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. Its up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gothams Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto smells something special in a holiday package, and in his eagerness to grab the gift he makes a mess of Metropoliss festivities. / While escaping from a grizzly bear Ivandoe and Bert fall into an underground cave where a large Troll-woman in a party dress keeps them captive.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto embarks on a high-flying chase that creates major mayhem for a bus driver on his way to school. / The Bear is struggling against a greedy moth in his house. Trying to save his magic box he puts it on the porch and Masha finds the magic hat that can make her invisible

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny find a shiny ring while out fishing, but a mysterious creature lurks in water below

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the infiltrating Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them to the North Pole, where Lamput is taking photographs of arctic wildlife. The Docs decide to disguise themselves as various animals to get close to Lamput, only to be thwarted each time by the same animals theyre pretending to be, including a polar bear mother and her cub.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The two Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Beans landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is jealous of the Lemmings new game: an interactive dance mat connected to the TV where the idea is to jump around and perform dance sequences. As they fight over the mat, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a hidden mechanism in one of the Great Wall of Chinas watchtowers. The mechanism activates a game on the walls paving stones that is similar to the interactive mat, only life size. On your marks, get ready, dance!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzys stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chips memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. The Lemmings consider the worm the ideal game companion, but Grizzy needs the worm to make his knitwear. To become masters of the silkworm, the close enemies will go to harsh extremes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a crate of cell phones: theres one for everyone. But before being able to play with their new toys, they need to charge the batteries. This operation uses all the electricity stored in the cabins solar battery and prevents Grizzy from watching TV. Grizzy soon realizes that this is the least of his worries, for living with the Lemmings and their phones is a guaranteed nonstop stream of noise pollution.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a new passion: magic Chinese lanterns that they use for sound and light performances. Grizzy is not very enthusiastic about this new electric activity which keeps him from sleeping. While Grizzy thinks that he got rid of their lanterns, the Lemmings discover new high-tech lanterns capable of making even more of a ruckus.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay hands on an ancient console that lets you play life-sized games in the real world. The console emits magical streams of energy that randomly pick avatars to confront one another. Grizzy is chosen as the hero. He must leap onto platforms and confront both enemies and a fearsome leader: a panda equipped with bamboo sticks. The Lemmings are obviously in control of the joystick!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As the Lemmings rummage through an abandoned delivery tricycle filled with strange objects, they discover a delicious treasure: Yummy-filled Chinese brioches! Grizzy steals their tasty bounty and heads off to enjoy it alone in the cabin. The Lemmings find a mask in the tricycle that terrifies anyone who looks at it when its being worn by someone. The Lemmings intend to use their horrific new power to recover their stolen treats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out its Grizzys birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzys peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings party surprises!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea. Hell get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. One slight detail, the refrigerator shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed by the thawing ice, a mysterious giant egg slides up to the front door of the log cabin. The Lemmings watch the hatching of a large baby dinosaur that immediately mistakes them for his mummies. Grizzy cannot tolerate a new intruder like this in the cabin, but how does he earn the respect of a gang of Lemmings who are armed with a T-Rex, even it is only a baby?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is making pastries at the bakery. He takes Jerry and Tuffy and puts them in the pastries. Tuffy and Jerry both escape and make a pastry of their own, scaring Tom away.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lolas tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesnt think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a bad today doesnt mean itll be a bad tomorrow.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to drive a mile in each others wheels in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When the old Rooster Beetle comes to the end of his crowing days, everyone worries for Mush-Mush. Rooster is Mush-Mushs favourite. But Mush-Mush insists he is fine when everyoneknows he is not. So Mushpot and Starmush help him understand that its okay to show hisfeelings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends favourite play tree the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends mission to return it to Mush Mountain. Two problems though: there is a Beetle Boom on and all the beetles try to charge and knock over Mushables, and Lilit has always wanted to see an egg hatch so secretly drags her feet...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. But Cheps new friend must migrate with all the other weevils -Except he doesnt know how to fly! Chep must teach him to fly while overcoming his own secret fear of heights.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.desc: Nashvillen huutokauppa vetaa jalleen ostajia puoleensa sekalaisella tarjonnallaan, johon kuuluu mm. rekisterikilpia.

programme.title: Baggage Battles

Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Gepardin vauhti inspiroi Finiasia ja Ferbia valmistamaan huippunopeat kengat. Candacea eivat poikien puuhat kiinnosta, silla han valmistautuu Jeremyn perheen retkipaivaan. Pian han huomaa luvanneensa liikoja yhdelle paivalle ja astuu viallisiin prototyyppikenkiin ehtiakseen ajoissa kaikkialle. Tollontyolla on rahahuolia, ja han murehtii, joutuuko hanen talonsa myyntiin. / Finias ja Ferb ovat isovanhempien luona kylassa yhdessa ystaviensa kanssa. Lasten kisaillessa kuumailmapalloillaan Candace paattaa ottaa rennosti ja luopuu tavoitteestaan nalkittaa pojat. Myohemmin han oppii olemaan sisukkaampi. Tohtori Tollontyo rakentaa dronttinaattorin ja uhkaa paastaa valloilleen pelottavan dronttilintuarmeijansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat biosfaarin, jossa Isabella ja muuta partiotytot voivat hankkia ansiomerkkeja. Silla valin Candace pohtii, miksi Jeremy tykkaa hanesta ja tri Tollontyo ottaa kayttoon Sadenaattorinsa. / Candace lupaa Stacylle viettaa paivan taman kanssa ilman Jeremya, mutta yllattaen Jeremy tarttuu kiinni hanen kylkeensa. Han syyttaa veljiaan ja yrittaa saada nama irrottamaan Jeremyn samalla kun han itse yrittaa piilotella tata Stacylta. Samaan aikaan Isabella tahtoisi paasta viettamaan aikaa kahdestaan Finiaksen kanssa, mutta tama jahtaa ystavineen jattilaisrobottikoiraa ympari kaupunkia.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat valtavan terashain Danvillen vuosittaisia Satamapaivia varten, mutta Candace on jalleen paattanyt karayttaa heidat. Stacyn ja kapteeni Tihrun avustamana Candace lahtee metsastamaan haita ja veljiaan. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo onnistuu sotkemaan itsensa Suolavesitoffeennaattoriinsa. / Finias ja Ferb saavat selville, etta Kuun heikompi painovoima tekee jaatelosta erityisen hyvaa, joten he lastaavat raketin tayteen lehmia ja lentavat Kuuhun testaamaan teoriaa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo hyokkaa naapurinsa parvekekasvien kimppuun Kosteusimunaattorillaan ja Stacy auttaa Candacea kokkaamaan Jeremylle romanttisen aterian.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Bluey ja Bingo loytavat vanhan lelunsa, ksylofonin, jonka taikavoima jahmettaa isan paikoilleen, jolloin hanelle voi keksia jos jonkinlaista jaynaa. Lelu on kuitenkin niin kiva, ettei Bluey haluaisi millaan antaa Bingon valilla kayttaa sita, aidin uhkailuista huolimatta. Siskosten kiistely johtaa siihen, etta isa paasee nappaamaan taikaksylofonin ja jahmettamaan Blueyn, joten Bingo on nyt isosiskonsa ainoa toivo. Tytot paasevat asiassa yhteisymmarrykseen ja onnistuvat huiputtamaan soittimen takaisin itselleen.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Raugematu Laine
programme.desc: Moodunud sajandi kuuekumnendatel estraaditaevasse raketina soostnud ja tanaseni tegutsev ansambel Laine on vahem vi rohkem tormiliste aastate jooksul kogenud nii krgeid karisid kui ka sugavaid orge. Meenutame ja mtestame neid. Autor Vahur Kersna, reissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa.

programme.title: The Chelsea Detective
programme.desc: Peenramaalt leitakse kahe tundmatu sailmed ja niidid viivad USA saatkonnani. Paraku on kigil saatkonna tootajatel puutumatus ja tundub, et esimest korda jaab Maxil juhtum lahendamata.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Imetajad on vallutanud ka maailma kulmimad paigad lumega kaetud maetippudest jaatunud meredeni. Tanu erakordsele nutikusele ja hammastavale kohastumisvimele saavad imetajad hakkama ka kige karmimates tingimustes.

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: Laheme fotoretkele Naissaarele, kus loodusfotograaf Erik Mandre jagab oma kogemusi, kuidas tabada pildile selline ettevaatlik ja aukartustaratav loom nagu metssiga.

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Veterinaar Heli tuleb loomaaeda loomi vaktsineerima. Risto ja Mirge arutlevad, kas ja mis eksootilisi loomi viks kodus pidada ning mis saab siis, kui inimene enam loomaga toime ei tule. Risto tutvustab nende kollast vrkpuutonit Suvikrvitsat. Mirge ja Risto kulastavad sunnipaeva tahistavat Tallinna loomaaeda, et osaleda sealsel arutelupaeval. Tallinna loomaaia direktor kneleb loomaaedade tahtsusest. Mirge raagib vigastatud metsloomade aitamisest ja kes Eesti loomadest nende juures elavad. Saate tegid Hannes Raimla ja Pilleli Laets, tootja Pilleli And Hannes / PH TEIK O.

programme.title: Mehed, hakkame elama!
programme.desc: Kuidas esinejana pidevalt avalikkuse tahelepanu all sarada, aga mitte ennast lhkuda? Sellele peab mtlema koorijuht Hirvo Surva. Viime Hirvo psuhholoogi ja karjaarinustaja Tiina Saar-Veelma vastuvtule, Gerd Kanteriga laheme aga metsa ja ka kirglikult tantsu vihtuma. Kuidas see kik uhe mehe tervisele mjub? Saatejuht Kaidor Kaidor Kahar, reissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Teet Teder, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Saatejuht Reet Linna kohtub erinevate kuulsustega

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Luhhike oppetus Eesti kultuurist
programme.desc: Vaimuhuvi sakstel oli. Aga kuidas oma keha eest hoolt kanti? Ning mis elu elasid samal ajal lihtsad eestlased? Viiendas osas uurivad vennad Priit ja Mart Pius misaelu. Naiteks petab Nikolai Novosjolev vehklemist, Liis Burk kudumist ja Mati Laur avaldab, kuidas toona seksiti. Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, reissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnu ning kunstnik Karel Korp.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja reissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.title: Osnap vrdub Panso
programme.desc: Usute vi mitte, aga Eesti teatriajaloo suurkuju Voldemar Panso ehitas koos isaga oreli ja oli muusikas sama andekas kui teatris. Kes teda mjutas, millist muusikat ta armastas ja kui palju on Voldemar Pansot tanases teatris alles, avaldavad Hele Krve, Indrek Ojari ja Riina Roose.

programme.title: Torm
programme.desc: Hadaolukord ei huua tulles olgu selleks siis torm, uleujutus, elektrikatkestus vi midagi hoopis muud. Filmi peategelaseks on pereisa, kes otsustabki uhel paeval ootamatusteks valmistuma hakata. Sundmus vtab jaburnaljaka poorde, kui mees keskendub erinevate seadmete ja meetodite loomisele, mis poorab terve pere elu pea peale.

programme.title: Lynley
programme.desc: Kirik pakub varjupaika noortele sltlastele, kuid kaks nende hoolealust leitakse tapetuna. Kahtluse all on nii narkojugud kui ka mni usufanaatik, kes on asunud patuseid karistama.

programme.title: Minu ETV
programme.desc: Endised ja praegused telestaarid meenutavad hetki oma karjaarist ning raagivad, mida Eesti Televisioon neile tahendab. Toimetajad Karmel Killandi ja Kai Vaartnu, reissoor lle un.

programme.title: Laskesuusatamise MK-etapp
programme.desc: Kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Karel Kulbin. Rootsist teeb intervjuusid Ivar Lepik.

programme.title: Tana htul..
programme.desc: Nende laulude lihtsus, sudamlikkus, vahel ulevoolav rm ja teinekord traagiline alatoon on kuulajaid koitnud juba ule 30 aasta. Justament pusib jatkuvalt sadulas. Tana on Jaan Elgulal 63. sunnipaev.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Kitarrist Tiit Paulus elab nuud juba 36 aastat Saaremaal, kus ta vanast talust on elamise kpitsenud ja ka aastaid Kuressaare muusikakoolis noori petanud. Tiit Paulus meenutab koos Reet Linnaga muusikaelu ning raagib praegusest loomingust ja muusikast, mida inspireerib loodus.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende pnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Meie petajad
programme.desc: Uues osas kohtume Janno Jakobsoniga klassipetaja, doktorandi ja LAK-koordinaatoriga, kes petab muukeelseid lapsi Lasnamae gumnaasiumis. Janno jaoks on kige olulisem, et iga laps saaks ppida talle sobival viisil ja tempos. Noore petajana raagib Janno ka sellest, milliste valjakutsetega uued petajad kokku puutuvad. Saatejuht Uljana Kuzmina, reissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Jevgenia Volohhonskaja, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ukraina stuudio
programme.desc: Ukraina stuudio vtab kokku Venemaa-Ukraina sja viimased arengud. Saates antakse hinnang nadala jooksul sjatandril toimunule, arutletakse vimalike edasiste sjaliste ja poliitiliste arengute ule ning kaalutakse sja mju erinevatele valdkondadele. Stuudios astuvad koos saatejuhtidega ules eksperdid.

programme.title: Maailm ja mnda
programme.desc: Andres Dvinjaninov armus Menorcal hobustesse. Sellel saarel jumaldatakse hobuseid. Puhapaeva hommikuti toimuvad saare pealinna Mahoni hipodroomil viduajamised ja iga lugupidav kulaline teeb panuse oma lemmikhobusele - Andres tegi hobusele nr 6. Saates naete, mis edasi juhtus. Ciutadella oli saare tahtsaim linn kuni inglaste tulekuni 18. sajandil. Raagitakse, et selles linnas on uhe elaniku kohta kige rohkem losse. Oleme kulas krahv Carlos De Salottil, kes raagib oma uhkest suguvsast, kuid Andrest oma voodisse pikutama ei luba. Menorca uks agedamaid naisi on Nordic Walking Worldi maailmarekordi omanik Elana Segzodaite, ta petab Andrest igesti kaima. Igakevadise Menorca regati filmimine jai poolikuks, sest seal hakkas juhtuma nii mndagi... Saatesse mahtus ka kohtumine miljonar Marcos Martiniga, kes on investeerinud 40 miljonit enda startuppidega tegelevasse firmasse. Ja lpuks juame maale Luca Pons Olivese tallu, kus valmistatakse midagi eriti maitsvat. Menorcal filmisid Andres Dvinjaninov, Tiina Park ja Peeter levain. Saate tootis Free Studio.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Marthale ja Humphreyle pakutakse nende pulmapaeval kasulast. Annei peoplaanid on Martha ja Humphrey meelest liiga uhked. Muuseumist varastatakse vaartuslik eksponaat. Tabada tuleb kuberkurjategijad.

programme.title: Ridade vahel
programme.desc: Kulastame Parnut, kust on parit Eesti uks hinnatumaid lastekirjanikke Indrek Koff. Indrek on oelnud, et loodab oma teostega anda noortele edasi tunnetust, kuivrd fantastiline on kirjanduse maailm. Saates tuleb juttu sellest, kuidas Indrek ise fantastilisse kirjandusmaailma sattus ja millist rolli mangis selles suvepealinn Parnu ning sealne raamatukogu. Saatejuht Ave-Marleen Rei, reissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Ludwig
programme.desc: Ehitusplatsil kukub mees neljandalt korruselt alla. Kas see oli lihtsalt kohutav nnetus vi taiuslikult lavastatud mrv? Samal ajal, kui John puuab seda valja selgitada, kasvab Lucy meeleheide, sest nad ei ole endiselt ta abikaasa leidmisele lahemale judnud.

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: Shetlandilt parit neiu Ellen satub Londonis pealt nagema mrva ja pgeneb oma kodusaarele. Teda saadetakse otsima uurija Ruth Calder, kes on ka Shetlandilt parit. Samuti jalitavad Ellenit kaks gangsterit ja Calder peab igal sammul otsa vaatama mineviku varjudele.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Restoranis jatkub maruline ehitamine, sest avamine on ukse ees. iselt jahilt saabub varske kitseliha, mida asutakse isukalt valmistama. Hadavajaliku ehitamiseks tuleb minna jaatmejaama ideid ja materjale koguma. Hannes laheb aga klaasivabrikusse supikausse likama ei millestki muust kui kolmeliitristest purkidest. Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Mart Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Rezissoor Mikk Jurjens. Produtsent Eero Reinu.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Saatejuht Reet Linna kohtub erinevate kuulsustega

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Veterinaar Heli tuleb loomaaeda loomi vaktsineerima. Risto ja Mirge arutlevad, kas ja mis eksootilisi loomi viks kodus pidada ning mis saab siis, kui inimene enam loomaga toime ei tule. Risto tutvustab nende kollast vrkpuutonit Suvikrvitsat. Mirge ja Risto kulastavad sunnipaeva tahistavat Tallinna loomaaeda, et osaleda sealsel arutelupaeval. Tallinna loomaaia direktor kneleb loomaaedade tahtsusest. Mirge raagib vigastatud metsloomade aitamisest ja kes Eesti loomadest nende juures elavad. Saate tegid Hannes Raimla ja Pilleli Laets, tootja Pilleli And Hannes / PH TEIK O.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Lorenzo suudistab teenijaid varguses. Mara palub Veralt andeks. Feliciano langetab Petra suhtes otsuse. La Promesas toimub mustkunstniku etendus.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Vitlus linnugripi epideemiaga paneb kogu haiglas suhted proovile. Nikke ja Artturi lahevad politseisse tunnistust andma, kuid peavad ootamatult ka parameediku tood tegema. Ilmari lubab Irat aidata, kuid tegutseb liiga uisapaisa.

programme.title: Ridade vahel
programme.desc: Kulastame Parnut, kust on parit Eesti uks hinnatumaid lastekirjanikke Indrek Koff. Indrek on oelnud, et loodab oma teostega anda noortele edasi tunnetust, kuivrd fantastiline on kirjanduse maailm. Saates tuleb juttu sellest, kuidas Indrek ise fantastilisse kirjandusmaailma sattus ja millist rolli mangis selles suvepealinn Parnu ning sealne raamatukogu. Saatejuht Ave-Marleen Rei, reissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
programme.desc: Saatejuhid tmbavad selga oma kige soojemad riided ja suunduvad Rootsis phjapolaarjoonest 200 kilomeetrit phjapool asuvasse hotelli, mis tegutseb seal juba 27 aastat. Lumi, jaa, maaliline taevas ja mustiline umbrus loovad enneolematu hustiku.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lord Ashfordly korraldatud maakonna lambakoerte vistlusel tekib isiklik draama, mida avalikkuse ees lahendatakse. Vernon pakub oma teeneid, aga Bernie ja David ei taha seekord vedu vtta.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Tundmatu mees poordub Georgi poole juba selge ahvardusega. Mare ja Tjornborn lahevad tulli ning Mare jookseb Allani juurde lohutust saama. Linnapea kabinetti ilmub tema abikaasa, mis Tiigile sugugi meeldivaks ei osutu. Alma ja Johannes sidavad Tallinna Jaanuse juurde. Johannes teab Jaanuse tookohast. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Nikke ja Artturi silme all minestanud Milena seisund tekitab haiglas kusimusi. Aino on tudruku parast mures ja mure suveneb veelgi, kui Milena peigmees haiglasse tuleb. Jesse peab oma kaitumise parast Marjuti ees aru andma. Jannica otsustab baarihtul Maxi vrgutada.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Catalina on Pelayo ettepanekust okeeritud. Markii tabab Candela raamatukogust. Vanematel on Leonorile hea uudis. Mara vallandatakse.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Anna Pihl sdurirannakul
programme.desc: Ajakirjanik Anna Pihl vttis ette 24-tunnise katsumuse ja laks koos merevae kutsealustega sdurirannakule. Kuidas ta pea 50-kilomeetrisel matkal vastu pidas ja millistele jareldustele judis? Autor Anna Pihl, reissoor Tarvo Molder, produtsent Mai Kangro.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Tanavu aasta kalaks valitud Euroopa angerjas on kriitiliselt ohustatud liik, ometi jatkatakse tema puugi ja tarbimisega nii meil kui ka mujal Euroopas. Tutvume lahemalt selle omaparase kalaga ja uurime, mida tuleks teha, et tal oleks tulevikku. Taastav pllumajandus kogub mitmel pool maailmas populaarsust, sest toetab lisaks jatkusuutlikule tootmisele ka umbritsevat keskkonda. Kulastame Inglismaal uhte farmi, kus on juba sadu aastaid jarjepidevalt talupidamisega tegeletud ja uurime, milliseid vtteid seal kasutatakse. Karl Adami jalgib sookiuru tegemisi. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Valisilm
programme.desc: Valispoliitilisi sundmusi ja Eesti valispoliitikat kommenteerivad ning analuusivad Aktuaalse kaamera valistoimetuse ajakirjanikud. Saatejuht Maria-Ann Rohemae.

programme.title: Konflikti
programme.desc: Soome sjavaeuksus on just ppuse lpetanud, kui vaenlase sdurid Soome lunapoolseimasse punkti tungivad. ksus kannab markimisvaarseid kaotusi ja on sunnitud taganema. Noor ruhmaulem Annika Berg ja tema meeskond, ameeriklane Jeffrey Williams ja veel kaks inimest, pgenevad vaenlase eest ning otsivad nuudseks okupeeritud piirkonnas varjupaika. Taganevaid vagesid juhtiv kapten Rami lahkub oma postilt ning laheb isiklikule missioonile oma naist ja tutart otsima. Tundmatu vaenlane saadab snumi asja valitud Soome presidendile.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Marthale ja Humphreyle pakutakse nende pulmapaeval kasulast. Annei peoplaanid on Martha ja Humphrey meelest liiga uhked. Muuseumist varastatakse vaartuslik eksponaat. Tabada tuleb kuberkurjategijad.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lord Ashfordly korraldatud maakonna lambakoerte vistlusel tekib isiklik draama, mida avalikkuse ees lahendatakse. Vernon pakub oma teeneid, aga Bernie ja David ei taha seekord vedu vtta.

programme.title: 55-mis siis!
programme.desc: ETV juubelisaade on lainetavate sikspakkidega tugitoolisportlaste paralt! Reissoor Maire Radsin, saatejuht Johannes Naan, tekstide autor Martin Aare, toimetaja Reet Linna, produtsent Age Kraus.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Yha loytamatta - Antti Hanhivaara
programme.desc: Antti Hanhivaaran katoaminen syksylla v. 2006 on noussut Suomen tunnetuimmaksi katoamismysteeriksi useastakin eri syysta. Tapauksen tiimoilta nousee liian monta kysymysmerkkia esille niin Antin ystavien vuoksi kuin paikallisen poliisin toimesta tai paremminkin sanottuna toimimattomuudesta. Tama tutkimus vakuutti meidat siita, etta rajan takana saattaisi olla auttajia kuin myos tutkimuksia haittaavia tahoja vastaamassa.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert arrives at New Orleans to find a restaurant full of history but in need of his help. The livelihood of two families depends on its success.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert is called to Js Restaurant in Waveland, Mississippi. He must help owners Louis and Jeff rescue their business and save their lifelong friendship.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew explores the bountiful larder of the Scottish Highlands from lean, flavorful Highland beef and sweet, buttery shellfish to handheld meat pies and smoked salmon.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern explores iconic dishes of picturesque Nova Scotia, Canada, where the proximity to the sea, its never more than 42 miles away, influences the local cuisine.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew scopes out the creative and rustic comfort dishes of Quebec City, Canada. Influenced by French and English settlers, the city is full of old world charm, late-night diners, hearty food and plenty of maple syrup.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern explores the classic comfort foods and modern recipes of Porto, Portugal. He tries salty cod in a creamy casserole, tripe stew and octopus rice.

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: The 10 remaining chefs are assigned famous works of art to use for inspiration as they prepare impressive plates of food for judge Fariyal Abdullahi.

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: Hour 13 of this extreme culinary competition features unrelenting twists and turns for the exhausted chefs. First, co-hosts Michael Symon and Esther Choi challenge the nine remaining competitors to turn snacks they find in the breakroom into dessert. Then, after being given only two minutes to shop for a lumberjack breakfast, the chefs must turn their breakfast ingredients into a different meal entirely for judge Brooke Williamson. And thats just the beginning!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri checks out a Florida sandwich shop with a taste of Peru and a pierogi palace in Philadelphia. And a North Dakota pizza joint serves up meatballs.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy tastes seafood and chow-chow in Palm Beach, Florida. Later, he visits a funky Filipino joint in Hawaii to sample their spin on pigs feet.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy tucks into lobster enchiladas and lionfish rolls at a waterside restaurant in Florida. Plus, he chows down on Vietnamese sandwiches and spring rolls.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Its a kerfuffle in the kitchen as four chefs work with prized fungi in every round. A pricey cut of meat in the entree basket puts pressure on the chefs.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: The competitors create appetisers including Central Asian bread and a sweet-and-sour treat. The dessert round features an Indian snack and pastries.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: The holidays are the best time of year to get comfy on the couch and watch some classic Christmas movies, so hosts Ree Drummond and Eddie Jackson challenge four of the best cookie makers around to dream up a movie of their own and decorate a cookie poster for it. The one who creates a box-office flop will be sent home for the holidays, while the one who creates cinematic magic will gain an advantage for the next round. The three remaining cookie makers take inspiration from one of the most beloved holiday movies of all time, A Christmas Story, to create a vintage TV showing their favorite scene from the film. For this merry movie night, theyll have to use some popular snacks in their displays like popcorn, chocolate covered raisins, potato chips or chocolate-covered pretzels. The cookie maker who makes this sweet holiday classic even sweeter will win $10,000 and the fra-gee-lay Golden Ornament!
